field.name: description
field.value: In the AspViewBase.InitProperties method the ControllerContext.Helpers collection get copied to the AspViewBase.Properties collection before the Request.Params get copied. The Request.Params["URL"] value overwrites the Helpers["Url"] value and because the AspViewBase.Helpers property simply returns the AspViewBase.Properties collection wrapped with the IHelpersAccesor interface an exception is thrown whenever I try to access Helpers.Url. The solution I used is to simply use the ControllerContext.Helpers collection for the AspViewBase.Helpers DictionaryAdapter instead of the AspViewBase.Properties collection.
